body.name: New Version Handheld Bidet Sprayer for Toilet, Premium Stainless Steel Bathroom Bidet Sprayer Set, Baby Cloth Diaper Sprayer with Superior Complete Bidet Spray Hoses Kit, Support Wall or Toilet Mount

features: 【SUPERIOR PRODUCT FOR EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE】 Pugrwei Bidet Toilet Sprayer is made from high quality 304 stainless steel and lead-free brass for increased durability and resistance to oxidation and corrosion. Also, the inner toilet faucet sprayer hose is made from high-grade EPDM, reinforced with high density nylon braiding, to get rid of leak problems and be able to withstand high pressure. Just control the adjustable water pressure through buttons to achieve more thorough cleanliness!

【MULTIPURPOSE FULFILL YOUR MORE NEED】You'll find such a simple bathroom spray kit set that will bring more convenience to your life.This handheld bidet can not only clean body, particularly ideal as hygienic sprayer for women during pregnancy/menstrual cycles to get a gentle and thorough clean up, but also can be used as a cloth diaper sprayer, toilet cleaning, potty too, pet shower, car wash gun, etc. which will make the "dirty work" so much easier. Such a great practical bidet sprayer kit!

【SUPER QUICK AND EASY INSTALLATION】This bidet attachment set contains all the installation group components so you don't have to buy anything else, and no plumber, you will be able to install this toilet hose sprayer faucet spray hoses without professional help in under 10 minutes!. The bathroom bidet sprayer set supports two installation methods (Wall or Toilet Mount), easy DIY for you! All you have to do is to pay attention and make sure that your toilet tank's water inlet diameter is "7/8"

【PROTECT ENVIRONMENT AND SAVE RESOURCES】As the studies show, an average person uses at least 57 sheets of toilet paper every day in the USA. Not to mention the trees that were cut down and the water utilized to produce the toilet paper. Now with this handheld bidet spray that will prevent all of this, it can help you save a lot of toilet paper, not only for the natural environment, but also save your money for toilet paper. Moreover, this handheld bidet sprayer kits ensure your healthy life!
【COMPLETE AFTER SALES SUPPORT】 If you have any questions, please contact us through Amazon Supports

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Seems to be good quality. Easy to install. No leaks after a couple months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bidet is a must
reviews.reviewText: I love this bidet, and it was very easy to install. I will be honest that I hesitated, because the whole process just seemed very intimidating. It’s not bad.What I love about the bidet is that it doesn’t need to be hooked up to anything else besides the toilet and the pipe. Just make sure that you read the instructions carefully and you watch the video provided on Amazon. You will be fine.I use the bidet on myself and if the water is cold in the pipes, you will be using cold water on yourself. It is not temperature regulating.I also use a bidet to clean my bathroom. I love how strong the stream is and yes, you can control the stream. I will scrub my bathtub or let bleach sit on everything for a little while, and spray everything down using the bidet. This is honestly the best thing I have purchased for my bathroom.Just remember to close the valve when you’re not using it otherwise you’re at risk of having a leak as per instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't fit on hook
reviews.reviewText: This sprayer is great. I installed it myself and is good all-around except that it won't hang on its hook which is annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars never going thru life without one of these now lol
reviews.reviewText: had to go to the hardware store for an adapter tube cause this one didnt fit, but that was only 8 bucks. all hooked up and works good. its cold af but its like taking 20 showers a day. feeling clean af. dont even use tp anymore just a towel to pat dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect - no leaks!
reviews.reviewText: Love the pressure! I can control how hard or soft I want it. Easy to install too! Everything is provided

reviews.reviewText: The installation process is much easier than the previous item i have tried and no leaks so far. Also comes with all the necessary items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my best purchases in amazon
reviews.reviewText: I installed it in bathroom after my mom went under a surgery. It really helped her a lot while using toilet, made life easy. It kept the bathroom dry.
